function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of disinformation through preprints and press releases","Impact":"Misguided public health policy and misinformation","Mitigation":"Implementing strict peer review processes and fact-checking before publicizing results","Technologies":"Peer review platforms and fact-checking tools","People":"General public, policy-makers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, journals, and media organizations"},{"Description":"Publication of incorrect or misleading information","Impact":"Misdirected policies and wasted resources","Mitigation":"Triple-checking analyses and data, implementing rigorous validation processes","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, validation software","People":"Researchers, statisticians, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, peer-reviewed journals"},{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through research activities","Impact":"Spreading of infectious diseases within research facilities and communities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, promoting vaccination among researchers","Technologies":"Infection control systems, vaccination monitoring tools","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, local communities","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"}]}
